column2: Master Eska: Hmph, I can't believe you actually beat me.
column3: Kuya: Not as bad at waterbending than you thought I was, right?

column2: Master Eska: Fine, I'll admit it. You're a good waterbender.
Master Eska: Don't get ahead of yourself. You're the avatar and I'm an old woman. You're meant to beat me.
column3: Kuya: *Smirks* Don't be such a sore loser. :P
